employees.name: John Smith
employees.description: John has over 8 years of experience developing web and mobile applications. He specializes in React and Node.js development.
employees.remark: Good communication skills. Has shown leadership capabilities.

employees.name: Sarah Parker
employees.description: Sarah has worked extensively on AWS cloud platform managing large scale infrastructures.She also has 3 years of experience and has led multiple teams in cloud migration and deployment.
employees.remark: Excellent technical skills. Takes initiative in leading projects.

employees.name: David Carter
employees.description: David handles product planning, roadmaps, and development of new features. He has 7 years of product management expertise and comes from a developer background.
employees.remark: Outstanding ability to understand customer needs. Driven.

employees.name: Jenny Wilson
employees.description: Jenny focuses on designing intuitive and aesthetic interfaces for web and mobile apps. She has designed style guides for over 12 products till date.
employees.remark: Extremely creative. Pays attention to fine details.

employees.name: Mark Davis
employees.description: Mark has set up CI/CD pipelines, Kubernetes clusters and cloud infra for various products over the past 5 years. He is an expert in deployment automation.
